title: Programming synthetic molecular codes to turn genes 'on'

title_detail.value: Programming synthetic molecular codes to turn genes 'on'

summary: A team of researchers developed a synthetic molecular code to script gene activation. The process could help lead to future gene-based therapies for a wide array of diseases.

summary_detail.value: A team of researchers developed a synthetic molecular code to script gene activation. The process could help lead to future gene-based therapies for a wide array of diseases.
